name: One Hand Drive
description:
This game was created for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam. The theme being,  "Only One", One Hand Drive gives you control over Only One input at a time.  You must balance speed and steering.

Controls:

Mouse: Moves Hand

Left Mouse: Grab Steering Wheel or Throttle

R: Reset Level

ESC: Quit Game

P.S. Thank you for taking the time to try this game. It was a lot of fun to create so I hope it's at least a little fun to play. If I'm being honest this project turned out to be more of a proof of concept then a full fledged game. But, I'm hoping to expand on this idea in the future. If that interests you feel free to follow me on Twitter @VoonAtNoon. I'll post any developments there. Thanks again for playing!
